meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2574.

td.p: Bill Maher, a 1995 CableACE winner from Politically Incorrect
Charles Kimbrough, an actor from Murphy Brown
Swoosie Kurtz, an acclaimed actor from Sisters

tr.td: FAMOUS NAMES
BROADWAY
VAMPIRE LORE
THE PLANETS
GUINNESS RECORDS
WORD"Z"
(Alex: Each correct response will contain at least one "Z".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Charlie: What is... zydeco? That\'s absurd, isn\'t it?)
(Alex: It is indeed. But it was cute.)
(Charlie: It was almost hard to believe.)
[Beep]
(Alex: Don\'t try to overcomplicate it. The correct response, what is [*]?)

jazz

Charlie
Triple Stumper
')

(Bill: Okay. I didn\'t vote for him.)

Jerry Brown

Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_2', 'clue_J_6_2_stuck', '(Charlie: What is fizz?)
(Alex: That\'s nice, Charlie, but Swoosie rang in first.)
(Swoosie: Ha ha!)
(Alex: Say something, Swoosie, hurry!)
(Swoosie: What is [*]?)
(Alex: You got it.)
(Swoosie: Does that mean I get paid double since he made a mistake?)
(Alex: No, no, no. He wasn\'t recognized. The chair recognized you Swoosie, however. Select.)
...
[After the break, Alex informs the players that each correct response will not only contain a "Z", it will end with "Z".]

fizz

Swoosie
')

[She shakes her head, sure she doesn\'t know the correct response. But, she hazards a guess.]
(Swoosie: What is [*]?)
(Alex: [*] is correct.)
[Swoosie freaks out]
(Swoosie: It is?)
(Alex: And you took the lead just in the nick of time.)

iron

Swoosie
')

$1,000
John F. Kennedy, Jr.')
